mapper.select: select role_id as role from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
select invitation_code as inviteCode from t_sys_customer where customer_id = #{userId}

select t1.user_name as userName, t1.image_path as userImage, t1.role_id as role, t3.area_name as provinceName, t4.area_name as cityName, t5.area_name as areaName, t2.address as address, t1.version as version, t6.store_id as storeId, t6.invite_code as inviteCode, t6.store_name as storeName from t_sys_user t1 left join t_info_store t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id left join t_info_area_level t3 on t2.province_id = t3.area_id left join t_info_area_level t4 on t2.city_id = t4.area_id left join t_info_area_level t5 on t2.area_id = t5.area_id left join t_info_store t6 on t1.user_id = t6.user_id where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t1.is_delete = 0
select user_name as userName, user_name as driverName, image_path as userImage, role_id as role, phone as phone, version as version from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId} and is_delete = 0

select t1.user_name as userName, t1.image_path as userImage, t1.role_id as role,
t3.store_name as storeName, t3.store_id as storeId,
t1.version as version from
t_sys_customer t2, t_info_store t3,
t_sys_user t1 where t1.user_id = #{userId}
and t1.user_id = t2.customer_id and t2.invitation_code = t3.invitation_code
and t1.is_delete = 0
select user_password as userPassword from t_sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
